<script type="text/javascript">
function getActionCreator(o){var n,i,t;return window.Actions?([n,i]=o.split("."),(t=window.Actions[n])?t[i]||(console.warn("Unknown action: "+o),null):(console.warn("Unknown reducer: "+n),null)):(console.warn("getActionCreator: 'window.Actions' not found yet."),null)}function dispatchOrQueueAction(n,o){if(window.actionQueue=window.actionQueue||[],window.reduxStore&&window.Actions){var i=getActionCreator(n);if(i)try{var t=i(o);window.reduxStore.dispatch(t)}catch(o){console.error(`[dispatchOrQueueAction] Error dispatching "${n}":`,o)}else console.warn(`[dispatchOrQueueAction] No action creator found for "${n}".`),void 0}else window.actionQueue.push({action:n,payload:o})}window.dispatchOrQueueAction=dispatchOrQueueAction;;
</script>

<script async="" type="text/javascript">
window.lazyObserveElement = function(element, callback, distance) {
var offset = 1000;
if (distance) {
offset = distance;
}
if (window.IntersectionObserver) {
var margin = offset + "px";
var observer = new window.IntersectionObserver(function (entries, observer) {
entries.forEach(function(entry) {
if (entry.isIntersecting) {
window.requestAnimationFrame(callback);
observer.disconnect();
}
})
}, {threshold:[0],rootMargin:margin});
observer.observe(element);
} else {
window.requestAnimationFrame(callback);
}
};
</script>

<script id="vanilla-slice-externals">
    const loadExternalsScript = () => {
        return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
            try {
                const scriptTag = document.createElement('script');
                scriptTag.async = true;
                scriptTag.type = 'text/javascript';
                scriptTag.id = 'vanilla-slice-externals-script';
                scriptTag.src = 'https://slice.vanilla.futurecdn.net/13-4-11/js/externals.js';
                scriptTag.onload = resolve;
                const firstScriptTag = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
                firstScriptTag.parentNode.insertBefore(scriptTag, firstScriptTag);
            } catch (err) {
                reject(err);
            }
        });
    };
    var externalsScriptLoaded = loadExternalsScript();
</script>

/**
* Simple hasBarrier Promise for Ad Targeting
* Waits for Kiosq library to finalize hasBarrier after v2/campaigns
*/
// Create promises for v2 data and hasBarrier resolution
window.FUTR.Kiosq.promiseKiosqDataV2 = new Promise((resolve) => {
window.FUTR.Kiosq.resolveKiosqDataV2 = resolve;
});
window.FUTR.Kiosq.promiseHasBarrier = new Promise((resolve) => {
window.FUTR.Kiosq.resolveHasBarrier = resolve;
});
// Resolve hasBarrier after Kiosq v2 and campaigns complete
const resolveHasBarrierFinal = () => {
// Use hasBarrier calculated by Kiosq library, or false if not set
// We DON'T use displayBarrier as fallback because in metered paywall:
// - displayBarrier = true (page has paywall configured)
// - hasBarrier = false (user still has free articles)
const finalHasBarrier = window.FUTR.Kiosq?.hasBarrier ?? false;
window.FUTR.Kiosq.resolveHasBarrier(finalHasBarrier);
console.log(
'%cKIOSQ',
'color: #ffffff; background-color: #7F00FF; padding: 2px 6px;',
'hasBarrier resolved:',
finalHasBarrier,
'from:',
window.FUTR.Kiosq?.hasBarrier !== undefined ? 'kiosq-library' : 'default (false)'
);
};
// Wait for v2, then allow minimal time for campaign overrides (50ms optimized for speed)
if (window.FUTR.Kiosq.promiseKiosqDataV2) {
window.FUTR.Kiosq.promiseKiosqDataV2
.then(() => setTimeout(resolveHasBarrierFinal, 50))
.catch(() => setTimeout(resolveHasBarrierFinal, 50));
} else {
setTimeout(resolveHasBarrierFinal, 0);
}
window.FUTR.Kiosq.isHubPage = false;
window.FUTR.Kiosq.kiosqEndpoint = "https:\/\/kiosq.vanilla.tools";
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
window.FUTR = window.FUTR || {};
window.FUTR.Kiosq = window.FUTR.Kiosq || {};
window.FUTR.Kiosq.isPremium = false;
window.FUTR.Kiosq.displayBarrier = true;
window.FUTR.Kiosq.disableServices = [];
</script>

}
}

return '%' + ('00' + c.charCodeAt(0).toString(16)).slice(-2);
}).join(''));
return JSON.parse(jsonPayload);
});

<script>
window.ccpaAppliesPromise = new Promise(function (resolve) {
if (typeof window.__tcfapi === 'function') {
try {
window.__tcfapi('getTCData', 2, function () {
if (typeof window.__uspapi === 'function') {
window.__uspapi('getUSPData', 1, function (uspData, _success) {
var ccpaApplies =
JSON.stringify(uspData).indexOf('---') === -1 ? true : false;
resolve(ccpaApplies);
});
}
});
} catch (err) {}
}
});
window.reliableConsentGiven = new Promise(function (resolve) {
if (typeof window.__tcfapi === 'function') {
window.__tcfapi('addEventListener', 2, function (data, success) {
if (
success &&
(data.eventStatus === 'tcloaded' || data.eventStatus === 'useractioncomplete')
) {
resolve({ consent: data });
}
});
}
});

<script>
window.adParameters = window.adParameters || {
site: 'theweek',
content: 'unknown',
type: 'standard',
};
</script>
<script>
const headElement = document.querySelectorAll('head')[0];
const BORDEAUX_QUERY_PARAM = 'hybrid_bordeaux_version';
const CHAMPAGNE_QUERY_PARAM = 'hybrid_champagne_version';
const bordeauxScriptTag = document.createElement('script');
bordeauxScriptTag.setAttribute("src", 'https://bordeaux.futurecdn.net/bordeaux.js');
bordeauxScriptTag.setAttribute("onerror", "handleHeaderError()");
bordeauxScriptTag.setAttribute("crossorigin", "anonymous");
bordeauxScriptTag.defer = true;
const champagneScriptTag = document.createElement('script');
champagneScriptTag.setAttribute("src", 'https://champagne.futurecdn.net/champagne.js');
champagneScriptTag.setAttribute("onerror", "handleHeaderError()");
champagneScriptTag.setAttribute("crossorigin", "anonymous");
champagneScriptTag.defer = true;
const searchParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);
const qaBordeauxString = searchParams.get(BORDEAUX_QUERY_PARAM);
const qaChampagneString = searchParams.get(CHAMPAGNE_QUERY_PARAM);
let adToolVersion = '';
let featureFlags = window.vanilla.featureFlags;
let pageType = window.adParameters.type;
if (searchParams.has(BORDEAUX_QUERY_PARAM) && qaBordeauxString) {
bordeauxScriptTag.setAttribute("src", `https://bdx.${qaBordeauxString}.public.rtb-qa-eks-euw1.futureplc.engineering/bordeaux.js`);
adToolVersion = `${qaBordeauxString}`;
}
if (searchParams.has(CHAMPAGNE_QUERY_PARAM) && qaChampagneString) {
champagneScriptTag.setAttribute("src", `https://chmp.${qaChampagneString}.public.rtb-qa-eks-euw1.futureplc.engineering/champagne.js`);
}
if (window.disableBordeaux === undefined || window.disableBordeaux === false) {
headElement.append(bordeauxScriptTag, champagneScriptTag);
}
window.bordeaux = window.bordeaux || {};
window.bordeaux.cmd = window.bordeaux.cmd || [];
window.bordeaux.cmd.push(function () {
if (adToolVersion !== '') {
window.bordeaux.setAdToolVersion(adToolVersion);
}
if (window.disableBordeaux === true) {
window.bordeaux.setPageTemplate('no-ads');
return;
}
if (window.dfp_config) {
var getDfpVar = function (name) {
return window.dfp_config[name] || '';
};
var getDfpList = function (name) {
var val = getDfpVar(name);
return val ? val.split(',') : [];
};
window.bordeaux.setTargeting({
articleid:getDfpVar ('article_id'),
pagetype: getDfpList('page_type').join('-'),
sitePlatform: getDfpVar ('site_platform'),
brand: getDfpVar ('product_brand'),
source: getDfpVar ('source'),
vertical: getDfpList('vertical'),
category: getDfpVar ('category'),
child_category: getDfpVar ('child_category'),
grandchild_category: getDfpVar ('grandchild_category'),
author: getDfpVar ('author'),
template: getDfpVar ('template'),
jwplayer: Boolean(getDfpVar('jwplayer')),
sponsored:getDfpVar ('sponsored'),
kw: getDfpList('keywords'),
});
if ((window.dfp_config.page_type === 'homepage' ||
window.dfp_config.page_type === 'list' ||
window.dfp_config.page_type === 'tag-listing') &&
window.dfp_config.vertical) {
window.bordeaux.setPageCategory(window.dfp_config.vertical);
} else {
window.bordeaux.setPageCategory(window.dfp_config.page_type || 'fallback');
}
}
if (window.FEPProcess) {
var fep = window.FEPProcess(window.FEP_object);
window.resolveFEP(fep);
window.bordeaux.setTargeting(window.FEPSanitise({
fepPrimaryProduct: fep.primaryProduct,
fepSecondaryProducts: fep.secondaryProducts,
fepCompanies: fep.companies,
fepCategory: fep.category,
fepGroups: fep.groups,
fepPrimaryCompany: fep.primaryCompany,
primaryCategory: fep.primaryCategory,
secondaryCategories: fep.secondaryCategories,
tertiaryCategories: fep.tertiaryCategories,
iabCategories: fep.iabCategories,
iabCategoryIds: fep.iabCategoryIds,
}));
}
if (window.VAN.abTest !== undefined) {
window.bordeaux.setTargeting({
vanillaVariationID: window.VAN.abTest.variationId,
});
}
// Add segment tags
if (window.ffte && window.ffte.lang) {
window.bordeaux.setTargeting({ content_language: window.ffte.lang })
}
if (window.ffte &&
window.ffte.properties &&
window.ffte.properties.articleControlTag &&
window.ffte.properties.articleControlTag.indexOf('type_buying_guide') > -1) {
window.bordeaux.setSlotAvoidanceDistance({ mobile: 600, tablet: 600, desktop: 600 });
}
// Set base page template
window.bordeaux.setPageTemplate("article-sidebar");
// Low ad density override
if (featureFlags.hasOwnProperty('lowAdDensity') &&
featureFlags.lowAdDensity.enabled === true &&
pageType.indexOf('listing') < 0 &&
pageType.indexOf('homepage') < 0 &&
window.innerWidth < 700) {
window.bordeaux.setPageTemplate("article-low-density");
window.bordeaux.setSlotAvoidanceDistance({ desktop: 800, mobile: 800, tablet: 800 });
}
// Calculate initial hasBarrier using simple logic
const calculateInitialHasBarrier = () => {
// If Kiosq library already set hasBarrier, use it
if (window.FUTR?.Kiosq?.hasBarrier !== undefined) {
return Boolean(window.FUTR.Kiosq.hasBarrier);
}
// If no paywall configured, no barrier
const displayBarrier = window.FUTR?.Kiosq?.displayBarrier ?? false;
if (!displayBarrier) {
return false;
}
// If user is granted access, no barrier
const isGranted = Boolean(window.FUTR?.Kiosq?.granted);
if (isGranted) {
return false;
}
// Check wall system type
const wallSystem = window.FUTR?.Kiosq?.defaultSiteConfig?.wall_system;
try {
// METERED: barrier depends on whether article was already viewed
if (wallSystem === 'metered') {
const kiosqAck = localStorage.getItem('kiosq_article_url_ack');
if (kiosqAck) {
const viewedArticles = JSON.parse(atob(kiosqAck));
const currentPath = window.location.pathname;
// If article already viewed &rarr; it's free &rarr; no barrier
if (Array.isArray(viewedArticles) && viewedArticles.includes(currentPath)) {
return false;
}
}
// Article not in list &rarr; probably has barrier
return true;
}
// CLASSIC: barrier always shown (when displayBarrier=true and not granted)
if (wallSystem === 'classic') {
return true;
}
// Unknown wall_system: default to displayBarrier value
return displayBarrier;
} catch (error) {
console.warn('Error calculating hasBarrier:', error);
return displayBarrier;
}
};
const initialHasBarrier = calculateInitialHasBarrier();
// Log initial calculation for debugging
console.log(
'%cKIOSQ',
'color: #ffffff; background-color: #7F00FF; padding: 2px 6px;',
'Initial hasBarrier calculated:',
initialHasBarrier,
'from localStorage + displayBarrier'
);
// For signedIn: Use UserId if Connect is loaded, otherwise fallback to granted status from server
const initialSignedIn = Boolean(window.FUTR?.Connect?.Auth?.UserId ?? window.FUTR?.Kiosq?.granted);
window.bordeaux.setTargeting({
signedIn: initialSignedIn,
paywall: initialHasBarrier // Calculated from localStorage + displayBarrier, updated by promise if Kiosq changes it
});
// Add futureCmsId if available
if (window.ffte?.properties?.id) {
window.bordeaux.setTargeting({ futureCmsId: window.ffte.properties.id });
}
// Set paywalled template if barrier is active
if (initialHasBarrier) {
window.bordeaux.setPageTemplate('article-paywalled');
}
/**
* Fire-and-forget Kiosq hasBarrier update
*
* We start listening to the Kiosq promise BEFORE Bordeaux init.
* If Kiosq resolves very quickly (unlikely but possible), we might
* catch the value change before init completes.
* Otherwise, we'll update the targeting after init (still 0ms delay for init).
*/
(function updateKiosqTargetingAsync() {
const hasBarrierPromise = window.FUTR?.Kiosq?.promiseHasBarrier;
if (!hasBarrierPromise) {
return; // No Kiosq promise, nothing to update
}
// Non-blocking: wait for final hasBarrier and update if different
hasBarrierPromise
.then((finalHasBarrier) => {
const finalValue = Boolean(finalHasBarrier);
if (finalValue !== initialHasBarrier) {
console.log(
'%cKIOSQ',
'color: #ffffff; background-color: #7F00FF; padding: 2px 6px;',
'hasBarrier changed:',
initialHasBarrier,
'->',
finalValue,
'- Updating targeting'
);
// Update targeting with the correct value
window.bordeaux.setTargeting({
paywall: finalValue
});
// Update page template if needed
if (finalValue && !initialHasBarrier) {
// Changed from no paywall to paywall
window.bordeaux.setPageTemplate('article-paywalled');
}
}
})
.catch((error) => {
console.warn('Kiosq hasBarrier promise error:', error);
});
})();
// Send Freyr event
window.dispatchOrQueueAction('freyr.sendEventToFreyr', {
name: 'hybrid_event',
eventObject: {
hybrid: {
takeover: window.bordeaux.getTakeoverActive()
}
}
});
// Initialize Bordeaux immediately (no delay)
// The Kiosq promise listener is already running above
window.bordeaux.init();
});
</script><script src="https://bordeaux.futurecdn.net/bordeaux.js" onerror="handleHeaderError()" crossorigin="anonymous" defer=""></script><script src="https://champagne.futurecdn.net/champagne.js" onerror="handleHeaderError()" crossorigin="anonymous" defer=""></script>

dm.AjaxData.push({ et: et,d: d,ssid: ssid,ad: ad});
window.DotMetricsObj && DotMetricsObj.onAjaxDataUpdate();
};

h = d.getElementsByTagName('head')[0],
s = d.createElement('script');

s.async = true;
s.src = 'https://uk-script.dotmetrics.net/door.js?d=' + document.location.host + '&t=weekus'; h.appendChild(s);
} ());

<script>
function comscoreIntegration() {
var TIMEOUT_DELAY = 2000;
var COMSCORE_ID = "10055482";
function callComscore(ucfrValue) {
window._comscore = window._comscore || [];
var comscorePayload = {
c1: "2",
c2: COMSCORE_ID,
options: {
enableFirstPartyCookie: true,
}
};
if(ucfrValue) {
comscorePayload.cs_ucfr = ucfrValue;
}
window._comscore.push(comscorePayload);
injectComscore();
}
function callComscoreForVideo(ucfrValue) {
window._comscore = window._comscore || [];
const seconds = 600;
const comscorePayload = {
c2: COMSCORE_ID,
c5: jwplayer().getDuration() > seconds ? "03" : "02",
};
if(ucfrValue) {
comscorePayload.cs_ucfr = ucfrValue;
}
if (!window.COMSCORE) {
window._comscore.push(comscorePayload);
} else {
window.COMSCORE.beacon(comscorePayload)
}
}
function injectComscore() {
let s = document.createElement('script'), el = document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];
s.async = true;
const URLbeginning = "https://sb";
if (window.__tcfapi) {
s.src = URLbeginning + '.scorecardresearch.com/cs/' + COMSCORE_ID + '/beacon.js';
} else {
s.src = URLbeginning + '.scorecardresearch.com/beacon.js';
}
el.parentNode.insertBefore(s, el);
}
if (window.__tcfapi) {
var timeout = window.setTimeout(function() {
callComscore();
}, TIMEOUT_DELAY);
window.__tcfapi('addEventListener', 2, function(res) {
window.__tcfapi('removeEventListener', 2, function() {}, res.listenerId);
const validStatus = ['tcloaded', 'useractioncomplete'];
if (validStatus.includes(res.eventStatus) && res.gdprApplies) {
window.clearTimeout(timeout);
callComscore(res.vendor?.consents?.[77] ? 1 : 0);
}
});
} else {
callComscore();
}
window.reliablePageLoad.then(function () {
window.document.addEventListener('jwplayerInstanceLoaded', function () {
jwplayer().once('beforePlay', function () {
callComscoreForVideo();
});
});
});
}
comscoreIntegration();
</script>

    margin: 1rem auto;
    background: #dcfce7;
    border-radius: 50%;
    width: 72px;
    height: 72px;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
}

.login-success-modal-checkmark {
    width: 52px;
    height: 52px;
    stroke: #22c55e;
    stroke-width: 5;
    fill: none;
    stroke-linecap: round;
    stroke-linejoin: round;
    stroke-dasharray: 36;
    stroke-dashoffset: 36;
    animation: drawCheck 0.6s ease forwards;
}

@keyframes drawCheck {
    to {
        stroke-dashoffset: 0;
    }
}

.login-success-modal-body {
    margin-top: 1.5rem;
}

.login-success-modal-message {
    color: #333;
}

.login-success-modal-close-button {
    margin-top: 2rem;
    background: linear-gradient(135deg, #f3f4f6 0%, #e5e7eb 100%);
    border: none;
    border-radius: 12px;
    padding: 12px 24px;
    font-size: 14px;
    font-weight: 600;
    color: #374151;
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: all 0.2s ease;
    position: relative;
    overflow: hidden;
}

.login-success-modal-close-button::before {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: -100%;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.6), transparent);
    transition: left 0.5s ease;
}
.login-success-modal-close-button:hover::before {
    left: 100%;
}
.login-success-modal-close-button:active {
    transform: translateY(0);
    box-shadow: 0 4px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
}
.login-success-modal-close-button:hover {
    background: linear-gradient(135deg, #e5e7eb 0%, #d1d5db 100%);
    transform: translateY(-2px);
    box-shadow: 0 8px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15);
}

.login-success-modal-particles {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 200px;
    pointer-events: none;
    z-index: 1;
    overflow: hidden;
}

.login-success-modal-particle {
    position: absolute;
    background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.6);
    border-radius: 50%;
    animation: float 3s infinite ease-in-out;
}

.login-success-modal-particle:nth-child(1) {
    width: 4px;
    height: 4px;
    top: 20%;
    left: 10%;
    animation-delay: 0s;
}
.login-success-modal-particle:nth-child(2) {
    width: 6px;
    height: 6px;
    top: 60%;
    left: 80%;
    animation-delay: 0.5s;
}
.login-success-modal-particle:nth-child(3) {
    width: 3px;
    height: 3px;
    top: 40%;
    left: 30%;
    animation-delay: 1s;
}
.login-success-modal-particle:nth-child(4) {
    width: 5px;
    height: 5px;
    top: 80%;
    left: 70%;
    animation-delay: 1.5s;
}
.login-success-modal-particle:nth-child(5) {
    width: 4px;
    height: 4px;
    top: 30%;
    left: 90%;
    animation-delay: 2s;
}

@keyframes float {
    0% {
        transform: translateY(0);
        opacity: 1;
    }
    50% {
        transform: translateY(-10px);
        opacity: 0.6;
    }
    100% {
        transform: translateY(0);
        opacity: 1;
    }
}


.login-success-modal-header {
    background: linear-gradient(135deg, #10b981 0%, #059669 100%);
    border-radius: 5px;
    padding: 40px 30px;
    color: white;
}</style></head>

<h1 class="header__title ">Cristiano Ronaldo vs. Lionel Messi: how they compare on goals, career stats and awards</h1>
<p class="header__strapline">Stars continue to break records and push their 20-year rivalry even as they enter the twilight of their careers</p>
<div class="byline">
<div class="flex flex-col sm:flex-row items-start sm:items-center text-left text-zinc-900 uppercase text-xs">
<div class="flex items-center">
<div class="flex flex-col sm:flex-row">
<div class="mr-1 whitespace-nowrap">
<span>
By
<a href="https://theweek.com/author/the-week-uk" class="whitespace-nowrap text-zinc-900 " rel="author" aria-label="View profile for The Week UK" data-before-rewrite-localise="https://theweek.com/author/the-week-uk">The Week UK</a>, <a href="https://theweek.com/author/mike-starling" class="whitespace-nowrap text-zinc-900 " rel="author" aria-label="View profile for Mike Starling, The Week UK" data-before-rewrite-localise="https://theweek.com/author/mike-starling">Mike Starling, The Week UK</a> </span>
</div>
<span class="text-stone-500 whitespace-nowrap">
<span>
last updated
<time data-component-name="UI:DateTime" datetime="2025-10-29T08:43:29Z" class="relative-date">October 29, 2025</time>
</span>
</span>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</header>
</div>
</div>
<div data-widget-type="contentparsed" id="content" class="clear-both widget widget-contentparsed widget-content widget-contentparsed-content widget-content-parsed widget-content-parsed-default ">
<div class="wcp-item-content">
<section class="article-wrapper">
<div class="image image--hero">
<div class="image-hero__padding-wrap padding-on">
<div class="image-hero__padding" style="padding-top:56.3%;">
<picture data-new-v2-image="true">
<source type="image/webp" srcset="https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/PBKmcES9LoJvuEsFFVtizm-1000-80.jpg.webp 1920w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/PBKmcES9LoJvuEsFFVtizm-1000-80.jpg.webp 1600w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/PBKmcES9LoJvuEsFFVtizm-1000-80.jpg.webp 1280w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/PBKmcES9LoJvuEsFFVtizm-1000-80.jpg.webp 1024w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/PBKmcES9LoJvuEsFFVtizm-768-80.jpg.webp 768w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/PBKmcES9LoJvuEsFFVtizm-415-80.jpg.webp 415w" sizes="(min-width: 1024px) 970px, 100vw">

</picture>
</div>
</div>
<div class="caption__text--hero">Cristiano Ronaldo becomes the first player to score 900 top-tier career goals</div>

<p id="a2ac1a9b-ef2d-4770-8a19-13fb6773d44c">The debate over Cristiano Ronaldo vs. Lionel Messi has divided football fans, pundits and players for nearly two decades.</p><div id="ad-unit-1" class="ad-unit"></div><p>There are those who â€œadmire the magical technical skills and artistry of Messi,â€ said the <a data-analytics-id="inline-link" href="https://www.express.co.uk/sport/football/1977816/messi-ronaldo-debate-managers-ferguson-rooney%20" target="_blank" data-url="https://www.express.co.uk/sport/football/1977816/messi-ronaldo-debate-managers-ferguson-rooney%20" referrerpolicy="no-referrer-when-downgrade" data-hl-processed="none" data-mrf-recirculation="inline-link" data-hawk-tracked="hawklinks" data-mrf-link="https://www.express.co.uk/sport/football/1977816/messi-ronaldo-debate-managers-ferguson-rooney%20" cmp-ltrk="inline-link" cmp-ltrk-idx="0" mrfobservableid="72c0fff1-b404-4de9-b433-07f50768a0e2">Daily Express</a>, and â€œothers who are in awe of the goal-scoring machine and athletic force that is Ronaldoâ€.</p><a id="elk-seasonal" data-url="" href="" target="_blank" referrerpolicy="no-referrer-when-downgrade" data-hl-processed="none" data-hawk-tracked="hawklinks"></a><aside data-block-type="embed" data-render-type="fte" data-skip="dealsy" data-widget-type="seasonal" class="hawk-root" data-widget-id="29b5707c-0305-4f50-8f94-2e438fc96eea" data-result="missing"></aside><p id="a2ac1a9b-ef2d-4770-8a19-13fb6773d44c-2" class="paywall" aria-hidden="true">â€œThis polarising discussion has been known to strain even the strongest of bonds among fans.â€</p><div id="blueconic-article-theweek"><div class="blueconic-article__wrapper">
<div class="blueconic-article__wrapper__top">
<div class="blueconic-article__wrapper__top__left-div">
<h2><span class="blueconic-article__wrapper__top__left-div-title">The Week</span></h2>
<p><span>Escape your echo chamber. Get the facts behind the news, plus analysis from multiple perspectives.</span></p>

<h2>Sign up for The Week's Free Newsletters</h2>

<div class="blueconic-article__wrapper__bottom__right-div">
<a href="https://theweek.com/newsletters" target="__blank" data-before-rewrite-localise="https://theweek.com/newsletters" data-url="https://theweek.com/newsletters" data-hl-processed="none" data-hawk-tracked="hawklinks">

</div>
</a>

</div>
</div></div><p>This week they were named as finalists for the Fifpro World XI, a â€œdream teamâ€ voted for by professional footballers around the world. Messi has made the cut a staggering 18 times since it launched in 2005, with his great rival Ronaldo not far behind on 16.</p><div id="ad-unit-2" class="ad-unit"></div><p class="paywall" aria-hidden="true">Last summer, Messi captained <a data-analytics-id="inline-link" href="https://theweek.com/tag/argentina" data-auto-tag-linker="true" data-mrf-recirculation="inline-link" data-before-rewrite-localise="https://theweek.com/tag/argentina" data-url="https://theweek.com/tag/argentina" data-hl-processed="none" data-hawk-tracked="hawklinks" data-mrf-link="https://theweek.com/tag/argentina" cmp-ltrk="inline-link" cmp-ltrk-idx="1" mrfobservableid="9a0b11b9-947a-4e61-a004-a2d71cbfa193">Argentina</a> to Copa America glory, in the process securing his 45th career trophy, surpassing the record set by Brazilian Dani Alves. It was his third consecutive major international tournament win, adding to the 2022 World Cup and the 2021 Copa America.</p><p class="paywall" aria-hidden="true">Not to be outdone, <a data-analytics-id="inline-link" href="https://www.theweek.com/sports/soccer/the-cult-of-cristiano-ronaldo-at-40" data-mrf-recirculation="inline-link" data-url="https://www.theweek.com/sports/soccer/the-cult-of-cristiano-ronaldo-at-40" data-hl-processed="none" data-hawk-tracked="hawklinks" target="_blank" referrerpolicy="no-referrer-when-downgrade" data-mrf-link="https://www.theweek.com/sports/soccer/the-cult-of-cristiano-ronaldo-at-40" cmp-ltrk="inline-link" cmp-ltrk-idx="2" mrfobservableid="d6c516bf-dfec-4a3d-ab7c-d75a6b8e67a1">Ronaldo</a> recently became the first player to score 950 top-tier career goals as he continues to bang them in for both club and country. The <a data-analytics-id="inline-link" href="https://theweek.com/sports/soccer/the-cult-of-cristiano-ronaldo-at-40%20" data-mrf-recirculation="inline-link" data-before-rewrite-localise="https://theweek.com/sports/soccer/the-cult-of-cristiano-ronaldo-at-40%20" data-url="https://theweek.com/sports/soccer/the-cult-of-cristiano-ronaldo-at-40%20" data-hl-processed="none" data-hawk-tracked="hawklinks" data-mrf-link="https://theweek.com/sports/soccer/the-cult-of-cristiano-ronaldo-at-40%20" cmp-ltrk="inline-link" cmp-ltrk-idx="3" mrfobservableid="3ab51782-6d83-49f7-99a4-25a3290d0bec">40-year-old</a> scored in Al Nassrâ€™s 2-0 win over Al Hazm as they continue their unbeaten start to the Saudi Pro League season. The Portuguese legend has now scored six goals in as many games, making it 106 in 119 games since joining the club in January 2023, said <a data-analytics-id="inline-link" href="" target="_blank" data-url="" referrerpolicy="no-referrer-when-downgrade" data-hl-processed="none" data-mrf-recirculation="inline-link" data-hawk-tracked="hawklinks">Talksport</a>. Provided he keeps fit, Ronaldo hopes to hit the 1,000 career goals mark within the next 12 months. â€œI know I donâ€™t have many more years, but the few I have, I try to enjoy to the fullest,â€ he told Canal 11, adding that he was â€œalways hungry for more.â€</p><p class="paywall" aria-hidden="true">With countless trophies and a host of personal records, Messi and Ronaldo have a very special rivalry. data-hl-processed="none" data-hawk-tracked="hawklinks"></a><h2 class="article-body__section" id="section-player-profile-lionel-messi"><span>Player profile: Lionel Messi</span></h2><figure class="van-image-figure " data-bordeaux-image-check="" id="a5a36a20-e3f1-4fda-87cf-8e67ddecf8e4"><div class="image-full-width-wrapper"><div class="image-widthsetter"><p class="vanilla-image-block" style="padding-top:56.25%;"> <picture data-new-v2-image="true">
<source type="image/webp" srcset="https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/LEzw6iqevrutfJpyVZeVKm.jpg.webp 1920w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/LEzw6iqevrutfJpyVZeVKm.jpg.webp 1600w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/LEzw6iqevrutfJpyVZeVKm.jpg.webp 1280w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/LEzw6iqevrutfJpyVZeVKm.jpg.webp 1024w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/LEzw6iqevrutfJpyVZeVKm.jpg.webp 768w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/LEzw6iqevrutfJpyVZeVKm.jpg.webp 415w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/LEzw6iqevrutfJpyVZeVKm.jpg.webp 360w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/LEzw6iqevrutfJpyVZeVKm.jpg.webp 320w" sizes="(min-width: 710px) 670px, calc(100vw - 30px)">
<img src="https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/LEzw6iqevrutfJpyVZeVKm.jpg" alt="Inter Miami&amp;amp;rsquo;s Lionel Messi" srcset="https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/LEzw6iqevrutfJpyVZeVKm.jpg 1920w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/LEzw6iqevrutfJpyVZeVKm.jpg 1600w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/LEzw6iqevrutfJpyVZeVKm.jpg 1280w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/LEzw6iqevrutfJpyVZeVKm.jpg 1024w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/LEzw6iqevrutfJpyVZeVKm.jpg 768w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/LEzw6iqevrutfJpyVZeVKm.jpg 415w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/LEzw6iqevrutfJpyVZeVKm.jpg 360w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/LEzw6iqevrutfJpyVZeVKm.jpg 320w" sizes="(min-width: 710px) 670px, calc(100vw - 30px)" loading="lazy" data-new-v2-image="true" data-original-mos="https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/LEzw6iqevrutfJpyVZeVKm.jpg" data-pin-media="https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/LEzw6iqevrutfJpyVZeVKm.jpg">
</picture></p></div></div><figcaption class=""><div class="caption-text"><p>Inter Miamiâ€™s Lionel Messi</p></div></figcaption><div class="credit">(Image credit: Peter Joneleit/Icon Sportswire via Getty Images)</div></figure><p id="a67b3821-e912-416a-843d-43745fc499b2">Lionel Messi spent the first 21 years of his career with FC Barcelona â€“ where he won Spainâ€™s La Liga title ten times and the Uefa Champions League four times â€“ before joining <a data-analytics-id="inline-link" href="https://theweek.com/tag/paris" data-auto-tag-linker="true" data-mrf-recirculation="inline-link" data-before-rewrite-localise="https://theweek.com/tag/paris" data-url="https://theweek.com/tag/paris" data-hl-processed="none" data-hawk-tracked="hawklinks" data-mrf-link="https://theweek.com/tag/paris" cmp-ltrk="inline-link" cmp-ltrk-idx="4" mrfobservableid="0220feaf-7023-4393-93df-773216c0b460">Paris</a> Saint-Germain in 2021. After two seasons in France, he signed for MLS team Inter Miami.</p><p>The Argentine â€œhasnâ€™t had any problem adjusting to lifeâ€ in Miami, said <a data-analytics-id="inline-link" href="https://www.foxsports.com/stories/soccer/lionel-messi-stats-tracker-every-goal-assist-and-trophy-for-inter-miami" target="_blank" data-url="https://www.foxsports.com/stories/soccer/lionel-messi-stats-tracker-every-goal-assist-and-trophy-for-inter-miami" referrerpolicy="no-referrer-when-downgrade" data-hl-processed="none" data-mrf-recirculation="inline-link" data-hawk-tracked="hawklinks" data-mrf-link="https://www.foxsports.com/stories/soccer/lionel-messi-stats-tracker-every-goal-assist-and-trophy-for-inter-miami" cmp-ltrk="inline-link" cmp-ltrk-idx="5" mrfobservableid="e4baf8d7-cba4-486e-a9cc-34942e14062c">Fox Sports</a>. As well as being among the goals he also helped the club win the 2023 MLS Leagues Cup after they beat Nashville SC on penalties in the final. Last October, he secured the 46th trophy of his career after Miami won the Supporters' Shield, given to the MLS club with the best regular season record.</p><p>After leading <a data-analytics-id="inline-link" href="https://theweek.com/news/sport/football/958966/a-tale-of-two-world-cups-messi-mbappe-money-well-spent-for-qatar" data-mrf-recirculation="inline-link" data-before-rewrite-localise="https://theweek.com/news/sport/football/958966/a-tale-of-two-world-cups-messi-mbappe-money-well-spent-for-qatar" data-url="https://theweek.com/news/sport/football/958966/a-tale-of-two-world-cups-messi-mbappe-money-well-spent-for-qatar" data-hl-processed="none" data-hawk-tracked="hawklinks" data-mrf-link="https://theweek.com/news/sport/football/958966/a-tale-of-two-world-cups-messi-mbappe-money-well-spent-for-qatar" cmp-ltrk="inline-link" cmp-ltrk-idx="6" mrfobservableid="c250b3d4-5a09-4f1b-a76e-8961031844aa">Argentina to World Cup glory in Qatar</a> in 2022&nbsp; Messi was named the menâ€™s player of the year at the 2022 Best Fifa Awards. The forward has won the Fifa award three times and is also a record eight-time Ballon dâ€™Or winner following his triumph in 2023.</p><p>At Qatar 2022 Messi scored seven goals, including two in the final against France. He played his 1,000th career match as Argentina beat <a data-analytics-id="inline-link" href="https://theweek.com/tag/australia" data-auto-tag-linker="true" data-mrf-recirculation="inline-link" data-before-rewrite-localise="https://theweek.com/tag/australia" data-url="https://theweek.com/tag/australia" data-hl-processed="none" data-hawk-tracked="hawklinks" data-mrf-link="https://theweek.com/tag/australia" cmp-ltrk="inline-link" cmp-ltrk-idx="7" mrfobservableid="83cb6001-200c-4b95-aec1-af7696ed9be6">Australia</a> in the round of 16.</p><p>Argentina also won the 2021 Copa AmÃ©rica with Messi the top goalscorer in the competition. After winning a gold medal at the 2008 Beijing Olympics, the Copa AmÃ©rica triumph in 2021 was his first in senior international football. South American champions Argentina won the 2022 â€œFinalissimaâ€, 3-0 against European champions <a data-analytics-id="inline-link" href="https://theweek.com/tag/italy" data-auto-tag-linker="true" data-mrf-recirculation="inline-link" data-before-rewrite-localise="https://theweek.com/tag/italy" data-url="https://theweek.com/tag/italy" data-hl-processed="none" data-hawk-tracked="hawklinks" data-mrf-link="https://theweek.com/tag/italy" cmp-ltrk="inline-link" cmp-ltrk-idx="8" mrfobservableid="c409b871-5631-4067-be37-4993876b207f">Italy</a>, with captain Messi named man-of-the-match at <a data-analytics-id="inline-link" href="https://theweek.com/news/sport/960556/in-pictures-100-years-wembley-stadium" data-mrf-recirculation="inline-link" data-before-rewrite-localise="https://theweek.com/news/sport/960556/in-pictures-100-years-wembley-stadium" data-url="https://theweek.com/news/sport/960556/in-pictures-100-years-wembley-stadium" data-hl-processed="none" data-hawk-tracked="hawklinks" data-mrf-link="https://theweek.com/news/sport/960556/in-pictures-100-years-wembley-stadium" cmp-ltrk="inline-link" cmp-ltrk-idx="9" mrfobservableid="cbcbb1df-61a7-4033-a715-f1263dfeaf3e">Wembley Stadium</a>.</p><p>He lifted his third consecutive major international tournament trophy last summer, after captaining Argentina to their second successive Copa America.</p><p>Messi is the only player in history to win the World Cup Golden Ball twice (2014 and 2022).</p><ul id="27fa9998-0c95-4499-9c1b-26449831d24d"><li>Full name: Lionel AndrÃ©s Messi</li><li>Nationality: Argentine</li><li>Age: 38</li><li>Born: 24 June 1987</li><li>Clubs: Inter Miami (2023-present); Paris Saint-Germain (2021-2023); Barcelona (2004-2021)</li><li>Ballon dâ€™Or wins: 8 (2023, 2021, 2019, 2015, 2012, 2011, 2010, 2009)</li><li>The Best Fifa Menâ€™s Player: 3 (2023, 2022, 2019)</li><li>Champions League winnersâ€™ medals â€“ 4: 2014-15, 2010-11, 2008-09, 2005-06 (all with Barcelona)</li><li>Laureus World Sportsman of the Year award: 2 (2023; 2019 joint winner with Lewis Hamilton)</li><li>Captained Argentina in their 2021 and 2024 Copa America win</li><li>Captained Argentina in their 2022 Fifa World Cup win</li><li>114 goals in 195 games (both national records)</li></ul><a id="elk-player-profile-cristiano-ronaldo" class="paywall" aria-hidden="true" data-url="" href="" target="_blank" referrerpolicy="no-referrer-when-downgrade" data-hl-processed="none" data-hawk-tracked="hawklinks"></a><h2 class="article-body__section" id="section-player-profile-cristiano-ronaldo"><span>Player profile: Cristiano Ronaldo</span></h2><figure class="van-image-figure " data-bordeaux-image-check="" id="74cc5d13-6336-439d-bfdc-1a31996f097c"><div class="image-full-width-wrapper"><div class="image-widthsetter"><p class="vanilla-image-block" style="padding-top:56.25%;"> <picture data-new-v2-image="true">

</picture></p></div></div><figcaption class=""><div class="caption-text"><p>Al-Nassrâ€™s Cristiano Ronaldo</p></div></figcaption><div class="credit">(Image credit: Robbie Jay Barratt/AMA/Getty Images)</div></figure><p id="ddd6e0d6-07b9-4619-9d59-fc1f9bad7208">Portugal star Cristiano Ronaldo has played his club football with Sporting Lisbon (2002-2003), Manchester United (2003-2009 and 2021-2022), Real Madrid (2009-2018), Juventus (2018-2021) and Al-Nassr in Saudi Arabia (2023-present).</p><p>The 40-year-oldâ€™s trophy collection includes five Champions League winnersâ€™ medals, plus league titles in England, Spain and Italy. At Qatar 2022 he became the first male player to score in five different Fifa World Cups. Ronaldo was also the first player to score at five European Championships.</p><p>Five-time Ballon dâ€™Or winner Ronaldo, who has scored more than 950 goals for club and country, is the top goalscorer in menâ€™s international football with 143 goals for Portugal and holds the record for most international appearances (225), having made his debut way back in 2003. He won the European Championship with Portugal in 2016 and is also the all-time top goalscorer for Real Madrid (451) and in the Champions League (141).</p><p>On 12 August 2023 Ronaldo won his first trophy in Saudi Arabia, scoring twice in Al Nassrâ€™s 2-1 victory over Al-Hilal in the Arab Club Champions Cup final. He extended his contract with the club over the summer, where he has enjoyed a perfect start to the new season with six goals and six wins out of six.</p><ul id="ffaad135-9198-4657-8fad-ec7a3c552a07"><li>Full name: Cristiano Ronaldo dos Santos Aveiro</li><li>Nationality: Portuguese</li><li>Age: 40</li><li>Born: 5 February 1985</li><li>Clubs: Al Nassr (2023-present); Manchester United (2021-22 and 2003-09); Juventus (2018-21); Real Madrid (2009-18); Sporting Lisbon (2002-03)</li><li>Ballon dâ€™Or wins: 5 wins (2017, 2016, 2014, 2013, 2008)</li><li>The Best Fifa Men's Player:&nbsp; 2 (2017 and 2016)</li><li>Champions League winnersâ€™ medals â€“ 5: 2017-18, 2016-17, 2015-16, 2013-14 with Real Madrid; 2007â€“08 with Man Utd</li><li>Captained Portugal in their Euro 2016 win</li><li>All-time top goalscorer in menâ€™s international football (143 goals)</li><li>All-time record menâ€™s international appearances (225)</li><li>Top goalscorer in the Uefa Champions League (141 goals)</li><li>First male player to score in five different Fifa World Cups</li></ul><a id="elk-all-time-goals-career-statistics-and-red-cards" class="paywall" aria-hidden="true" data-url="" href="" target="_blank" referrerpolicy="no-referrer-when-downgrade" data-hl-processed="none" data-hawk-tracked="hawklinks"></a><h2 class="article-body__section" id="section-all-time-goals-career-statistics-and-red-cards"><span>All-time goals, career statistics and red cards</span></h2><figure class="van-image-figure " data-bordeaux-image-check="" id="c367b2e9-6c00-40fb-bf2b-87db1ef16284"><div class="image-full-width-wrapper"><div class="image-widthsetter"><p class="vanilla-image-block" style="padding-top:56.25%;"> <picture data-new-v2-image="true">

</picture></p></div></div><div class="credit">(Image credit: Getty Images)</div></figure><p id="bd7d3c73-49a1-476d-bccc-444e6ebc3472"><strong>All-time goals, career statistics and red cards</strong></p><p><em>According to </em><a data-analytics-id="inline-link" href="https://www.messivsronaldo.app/" target="_blank" data-url="https://www.messivsronaldo.app/" referrerpolicy="no-referrer-when-downgrade" data-hl-processed="none" data-mrf-recirculation="inline-link" data-hawk-tracked="hawklinks" data-mrf-link="https://www.messivsronaldo.app/" cmp-ltrk="inline-link" cmp-ltrk-idx="10" mrfobservableid="106d793e-a047-4122-a7ba-e52d9ee5c1f0"><em>messivsronaldo.app</em></a></p><ul id="9b19cd4e-9045-4085-821d-3bbdad690469"><li>Ronaldo: 950 goals and 259 assists in 1,293 appearances</li><li>Messi: 891 goals and 399 assists in 1,131 appearances</li><li>Hat-tricks: Ronaldo 66; Messi 60</li><li>Career goal ratio: Ronaldo 0.73; Messi 0.78</li><li>Penalties: Ronaldo 178; Messi 112</li></ul><p id="ec4d82ef-20b9-493e-a7d3-96cad98be0f6"><strong>All-time club careers (excluding friendlies)</strong></p><ul id="a99740b6-8f7c-4171-978d-70a7b1f48d0d"><li>Ronaldo: 807 goals and 222 assists in 1,068 appearances</li><li>Messi: 777 goals and 339 assists in 936 appearances</li><li>Hat tricks: Ronaldo 56; Messi 50</li><li>Club goal ratio: Ronaldo 0.76; Messi 0.83</li><li>Penalties: Ronaldo 156; Messi 88</li></ul><p id="919b84f0-8535-4851-88ee-8bca17ffa498"><strong>Career red cards: Messi 3, Ronaldo 12</strong></p><p id="89c50bf5-3379-4eab-a7bf-0a85874c8ee3">Messi has been sent off three times in his career â€“ twice for Argentina and once for Barcelona. He saw red just 43 seconds into his Argentina debut after coming on as a sub against Hungary in 2005. He was also sent off against Chile in the 2019 Copa AmÃ©rica.</p><p>Messiâ€™s third career red card â€“ and first at club level â€“ came on 17 January 2021. In Barcelonaâ€™s 3-2 Spanish Super Cup final loss against Athletic Bilbao, Messi walked after VAR spotted him lashing out against Asier Villalibre.</p><p>Ronaldo has been sent off 12 times in his career â€“ once for Al-Nassr, once for Juventus, six times for Real Madrid and four times for Manchester United. â€œNotably,â€ said <a data-analytics-id="inline-link" href="https://www.goal.com/en-gb/news/who-more-red-cards-career-lionel-messi-cristiano-ronaldo/1oq21dbwn2jqo1i9eagugibyvk%20" target="_blank" data-url="https://www.goal.com/en-gb/news/who-more-red-cards-career-lionel-messi-cristiano-ronaldo/1oq21dbwn2jqo1i9eagugibyvk%20" referrerpolicy="no-referrer-when-downgrade" data-hl-processed="none" data-mrf-recirculation="inline-link" data-hawk-tracked="hawklinks" data-mrf-link="https://www.goal.com/en-gb/news/who-more-red-cards-career-lionel-messi-cristiano-ronaldo/1oq21dbwn2jqo1i9eagugibyvk%20" cmp-ltrk="inline-link" cmp-ltrk-idx="11" mrfobservableid="ee6e0ad3-82f8-427f-b012-4039150782cc">Goal.com</a>, â€œthe Portuguese has shown himself to be somewhat prone to losing his cool in derby matches.â€</p><a id="elk-international-football" class="paywall" aria-hidden="true" data-url="" href="" target="_blank" referrerpolicy="no-referrer-when-downgrade" data-hl-processed="none" data-hawk-tracked="hawklinks"></a><h2 class="article-body__section" id="section-international-football"><span>International football</span></h2><p id="93335406-84d1-49da-b7c8-b98dd4846888"><strong>International careers (friendly and competitive matches)</strong></p><figure class="van-image-figure " data-bordeaux-image-check="" id="486443fe-058a-4cd5-9970-2195757b70a5"><div class="image-full-width-wrapper"><div class="image-widthsetter"><p class="vanilla-image-block" style="padding-top:56.25%;"> <picture data-new-v2-image="true">

awards</strong></p><ul id="0d7e6bf6-6bd5-4de2-9a34-2ebd18ca0458"><li>2009-10: 34 goals</li><li>2011-12: 50 goals</li><li>2012-13: 46 goals</li><li>2016-17: 37 goals</li><li>2017-18: 34 goals</li><li>2018-19: 36 goals</li></ul><p id="a37370f0-8f96-40ed-b5d2-3a010730a8b9"><strong>Ronaldoâ€™s European Golden Shoe awards</strong></p><ul id="054816fb-f45c-42bc-8a29-5ab2e8e4c8a2"><li>2007-08: 31 goals</li><li>2010-11: 40 goals</li><li>2013-14: 31 goals (shared with Luis Suarez)</li><li>2014-15: 48 goals</li></ul><a id="elk-hat-tricks" class="paywall" aria-hidden="true" data-url="" href="" target="_blank" referrerpolicy="no-referrer-when-downgrade" data-hl-processed="none" data-hawk-tracked="hawklinks"></a><h2 class="article-body__section" id="section-hat-tricks"><span>Hat-tricks</span></h2><figure class="van-image-figure " data-bordeaux-image-check="" id="88cbff10-cd43-4b82-90c8-27e44bb3f9be"><div class="image-full-width-wrapper"><div class="image-widthsetter"><p class="vanilla-image-block" style="padding-top:56.25%;"> <picture data-new-v2-image="true">
<source type="image/webp" srcset="https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/zVGU9T2TVmPwzyGj3Z6vXF.jpg.webp 1920w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/zVGU9T2TVmPwzyGj3Z6vXF.jpg.webp 1600w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/zVGU9T2TVmPwzyGj3Z6vXF.jpg.webp 1280w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/zVGU9T2TVmPwzyGj3Z6vXF.jpg.webp 1024w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/zVGU9T2TVmPwzyGj3Z6vXF.jpg.webp 768w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/zVGU9T2TVmPwzyGj3Z6vXF.jpg.webp 415w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/zVGU9T2TVmPwzyGj3Z6vXF.jpg.webp 360w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/zVGU9T2TVmPwzyGj3Z6vXF.jpg.webp 320w" sizes="(min-width: 710px) 670px, calc(100vw - 30px)">
<img src="https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/zVGU9T2TVmPwzyGj3Z6vXF.jpg" alt="Man Utd&amp;amp;rsquo;s Cristiano Ronaldo celebrates his first goal against Tottenham" srcset="https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/zVGU9T2TVmPwzyGj3Z6vXF.jpg 1920w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/zVGU9T2TVmPwzyGj3Z6vXF.jpg 1600w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/zVGU9T2TVmPwzyGj3Z6vXF.jpg 1280w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/zVGU9T2TVmPwzyGj3Z6vXF.jpg 1024w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/zVGU9T2TVmPwzyGj3Z6vXF.jpg 768w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/zVGU9T2TVmPwzyGj3Z6vXF.jpg 415w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/zVGU9T2TVmPwzyGj3Z6vXF.jpg 360w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/zVGU9T2TVmPwzyGj3Z6vXF.jpg 320w" sizes="(min-width: 710px) 670px, calc(100vw - 30px)" loading="lazy" data-new-v2-image="true" data-original-mos="https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/zVGU9T2TVmPwzyGj3Z6vXF.jpg" data-pin-media="https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/zVGU9T2TVmPwzyGj3Z6vXF.jpg">
</picture></p></div></div><figcaption class=""><div class="caption-text"><p>Cristiano Ronaldo celebrating a goal for Manchester United</p></div></figcaption><div class="credit">(Image credit: Naomi Baker/Getty Images)</div></figure><p id="fb6e6a6d-1a47-436c-b1a1-9b5034d03b9c">The rate at which the duo score hat-tricks is â€œscarcely believableâ€, said the <a data-analytics-id="inline-link" href="https://www.messivsronaldo.app/detailed-stats/hat-tricks%20" target="_blank" data-url="https://www.messivsronaldo.app/detailed-stats/hat-tricks%20" referrerpolicy="no-referrer-when-downgrade" data-hl-processed="none" data-mrf-recirculation="inline-link" data-hawk-tracked="hawklinks" data-mrf-link="https://www.messivsronaldo.app/detailed-stats/hat-tricks%20" cmp-ltrk="inline-link" cmp-ltrk-idx="12" mrfobservableid="f1358466-bfc6-49e2-bddc-c963b5468e47">MessivsRonaldo.app</a>, with a â€œstaggeringâ€ 126 between them. Ronaldo leads the head-to-head 66-60, but Messi has a â€œslight edgeâ€ in frequency.</p><p>Of Ronaldo's 66 career hat-tricks, he scored 44 for Real Madrid, three for Manchester United, three for Juventus, and is currently on 10 for Portugal and six for Al-Nassr â€“ the most recent coming last September when Al-Nassr thrashed Al-Wehda 6-0 in the Saudi Pro League.</p><p>Messiâ€™s 60th career hat-trick came on the final day of the 2025 MLS regular season. His last international hat-trick came for Argentina in the 6-0 World Cup qualifying win over Bolivia in October 2024, bringing his total number in internationals to 10.</p><a id="elk-fifa-world-cup" class="paywall" aria-hidden="true" data-url="" href="" target="_blank" referrerpolicy="no-referrer-when-downgrade" data-hl-processed="none" data-hawk-tracked="hawklinks"></a><h2 class="article-body__section" id="section-fifa-world-cup"><span>Fifa World Cup</span></h2><figure class="van-image-figure " data-bordeaux-image-check="" id="2ab8a8dc-5cc8-4093-bebf-8302b851e6f6"><div class="image-full-width-wrapper"><div class="image-widthsetter"><p class="vanilla-image-block" style="padding-top:56.25%;"> <picture data-new-v2-image="true">
<source type="image/webp" srcset="https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/Q4hB7ZStcPQEyTKhodLKYK.jpg.webp 1920w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/Q4hB7ZStcPQEyTKhodLKYK.jpg.webp 1600w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/Q4hB7ZStcPQEyTKhodLKYK.jpg.webp 1280w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/Q4hB7ZStcPQEyTKhodLKYK.jpg.webp 1024w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/Q4hB7ZStcPQEyTKhodLKYK.jpg.webp 768w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/Q4hB7ZStcPQEyTKhodLKYK.jpg.webp 415w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/Q4hB7ZStcPQEyTKhodLKYK.jpg.webp 360w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/Q4hB7ZStcPQEyTKhodLKYK.jpg.webp 320w" sizes="(min-width: 710px) 670px, calc(100vw - 30px)">
<img src="https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/Q4hB7ZStcPQEyTKhodLKYK.jpg" alt="Lionel Messi kisses the World Cup in Qatar" srcset="https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/Q4hB7ZStcPQEyTKhodLKYK.jpg 1920w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/Q4hB7ZStcPQEyTKhodLKYK.jpg 1600w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/Q4hB7ZStcPQEyTKhodLKYK.jpg 1280w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/Q4hB7ZStcPQEyTKhodLKYK.jpg 1024w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/Q4hB7ZStcPQEyTKhodLKYK.jpg 768w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/Q4hB7ZStcPQEyTKhodLKYK.jpg 415w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/Q4hB7ZStcPQEyTKhodLKYK.jpg 360w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/Q4hB7ZStcPQEyTKhodLKYK.jpg 320w" sizes="(min-width: 710px) 670px, calc(100vw - 30px)" loading="lazy" data-new-v2-image="true" data-original-mos="https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/Q4hB7ZStcPQEyTKhodLKYK.jpg" data-pin-media="https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/Q4hB7ZStcPQEyTKhodLKYK.jpg">
</picture></p></div></div><figcaption class=""><div class="caption-text"><p>Lionel Messi kisses the World Cup in Qatar</p></div></figcaption><div class="credit">(Image credit: Quality Sport Images/Getty Images)</div></figure><p id="f36882e2-6488-4f23-8564-89f1dc24edb4">It was the perfect end to Lionel Messiâ€™s World Cup story. At Qatar 2022, the Argentina captainâ€™s fifth and final World Cup, he achieved his lifelong dream of lifting the trophy for his country.</p><p>With two goals in the <a data-analytics-id="inline-link" href="https://theweek.com/sport/football/956324/fifa-world-cup-qatar-2022-groups-dates-fixtures-stadiums" data-mrf-recirculation="inline-link" data-before-rewrite-localise="https://theweek.com/sport/football/956324/fifa-world-cup-qatar-2022-groups-dates-fixtures-stadiums" data-url="https://theweek.com/sport/football/956324/fifa-world-cup-qatar-2022-groups-dates-fixtures-stadiums" data-hl-processed="none" data-hawk-tracked="hawklinks" data-mrf-link="https://theweek.com/sport/football/956324/fifa-world-cup-qatar-2022-groups-dates-fixtures-stadiums" cmp-ltrk="inline-link" cmp-ltrk-idx="13" mrfobservableid="fa835cfc-80f9-4420-827e-df72c2a4ae93">epic final against France</a>, and a penalty in the shoot-out, Messi inspired Argentina to an unforgettable victory at the Lusail Stadium. He was also awarded the Golden Ball for the tournament's best player and only missed out on the Golden Boot after Kylian MbappÃ©'s brilliant hat-trick saw the French striker finish with eight goals. Messi scored seven goals and also provided three assists in Qatar, and he moved above <a data-analytics-id="inline-link" href="https://theweek.com/tag/brazil" data-auto-tag-linker="true" data-mrf-recirculation="inline-link" data-before-rewrite-localise="https://theweek.com/tag/brazil" data-url="https://theweek.com/tag/brazil" data-hl-processed="none" data-hawk-tracked="hawklinks" data-mrf-link="https://theweek.com/tag/brazil" cmp-ltrk="inline-link" cmp-ltrk-idx="14" mrfobservableid="7ace4143-0e59-4b21-9f11-1b2896442200">Brazil</a> legend Pele on the <a data-analytics-id="inline-link" href="https://theweek.com/news/sport/football/958318/fifa-world-cup-all-time-top-goalscorers-in-pictures" data-mrf-recirculation="inline-link" data-before-rewrite-localise="https://theweek.com/news/sport/football/958318/fifa-world-cup-all-time-top-goalscorers-in-pictures" data-url="https://theweek.com/news/sport/football/958318/fifa-world-cup-all-time-top-goalscorers-in-pictures" data-hl-processed="none" data-hawk-tracked="hawklinks" data-mrf-link="https://theweek.com/news/sport/football/958318/fifa-world-cup-all-time-top-goalscorers-in-pictures" cmp-ltrk="inline-link" cmp-ltrk-idx="15" mrfobservableid="83c4f855-b063-4b1a-993a-6c85974b91f3">World Cup all-time goalscorer list</a>.</p><p>Messiâ€™s brilliant tournament saw him break a host of records. He is now Argentinaâ€™s all-time highest goalscorer in World Cups with 13 goals. And he also has the highest number of appearances in menâ€™s World Cup history, with 26.</p><p>Messi â€œnot only emulated the deity of Argentinian footballâ€, Diego Maradona, but he â€œfinally plugged the burning gap on his CVâ€, winning the â€œone title that has eluded himâ€, said David Hytner in <a data-analytics-id="inline-link" href="https://www.theguardian.com/football/2022/dec/18/world-cup-final-argentina-france-match-report" target="_blank" data-url="https://www.theguardian.com/football/2022/dec/18/world-cup-final-argentina-france-match-report" referrerpolicy="no-referrer-when-downgrade" data-hl-processed="none" data-mrf-recirculation="inline-link" data-hawk-tracked="hawklinks" data-mrf-link="https://www.theguardian.com/football/2022/dec/18/world-cup-final-argentina-france-match-report" cmp-ltrk="inline-link" cmp-ltrk-idx="16" mrfobservableid="f33ca96c-3f2d-4234-930a-e514844c317f">The Guardian</a>. â€œIn the process he gilded his claim to being recognised as the greatest player of them all.â€</p><p>Cristiano Ronaldo also made history at Qatar 2022 as Portugal reached the quarter-finals, where they lost to Morocco 1-0. He became the first menâ€™s player to score in five separate World Cup tournaments. His World Cup record stands at eight goals in 22 appearances.</p><p id="5ee878a1-106c-49ad-be88-60104c1a13c0">Here we take a look at their World Cup stats, according to <a data-analytics-id="inline-link" href="https://www.messivsronaldo.app/detailed-stats/hat-tricks%20" target="_blank" data-url="https://www.messivsronaldo.app/detailed-stats/hat-tricks%20" referrerpolicy="no-referrer-when-downgrade" data-hl-processed="none" data-mrf-recirculation="inline-link" data-hawk-tracked="hawklinks" data-mrf-link="https://www.messivsronaldo.app/detailed-stats/hat-tricks%20" cmp-ltrk="inline-link" cmp-ltrk-idx="17" mrfobservableid="116b090f-0a06-44f0-b04b-5ef97a82719a">MessivsRonaldo.app</a>:</p><p id="af2125e5-b8b3-478e-a5a5-580b9cc55b1a"><strong>Messiâ€™s World Cup stats </strong></p><ul id="12011f9d-2218-4694-9d95-0f0ba4a49c35"><li>Games: 26</li><li>Goals: 13</li><li>Assists: 8</li><li>Minutes played: 2,314</li></ul><p id="035f38a3-b4ed-437b-8a10-9f454a264bf3"><strong>Messi's World Cup tournament goals: 13</strong></p><ul id="e3d7a864-2b8c-4446-a03d-809dc1289b9a"><li>2022: 7</li><li>2018: 1</li><li>2014: 4</li><li>2010: 0</li><li>2006: 1</li></ul><p id="171012e5-fb7a-4f45-aa0c-460a7485874c"><strong>Ronaldo's World Cup stats</strong></p><ul id="1f9501f6-e865-4527-8e44-1113956a8c81"><li>Games: 22</li><li>Goals: 8</li><li>Assists: 2</li><li>Minutes data-url="" href="" target="_blank" referrerpolicy="no-referrer-when-downgrade" data-hl-processed="none" data-hawk-tracked="hawklinks"></a><h2 class="article-body__section" </picture></p></div></div><div class="credit">(Image credit: Denis Doyle/Getty Images)</div></figure><p id="a7082b6b-7d49-4353-a129-ca5456667e21"><strong>Ronaldo vs. Messi in European football</strong></p><p id="c97e0e53-7bdf-4022-98b0-89e74e008f3a">Statistics according to <a data-analytics-id="inline-link" href="https://www.uefa.com/uefachampionsleague/news/0252-0cda365e6b04-04063053215a-1000--cristiano-ronaldo-and-lionel-messi-goal-for-goal/?referrer=%2Fuefachampionsleague%2Fnews%2Fnewsid%3D2244072%20" target="_blank" data-url="https://www.uefa.com/uefachampionsleague/news/0252-0cda365e6b04-04063053215a-1000--cristiano-ronaldo-and-lionel-messi-goal-for-goal/?referrer=%2Fuefachampionsleague%2Fnews%2Fnewsid%3D2244072%20" referrerpolicy="no-referrer-when-downgrade" data-hl-processed="none" data-mrf-recirculation="inline-link" data-hawk-tracked="hawklinks" data-mrf-link="https://www.uefa.com/uefachampionsleague/news/0252-0cda365e6b04-04063053215a-1000--cristiano-ronaldo-and-lionel-messi-goal-for-goal/?referrer=%2Fuefachampionsleague%2Fnews%2Fnewsid%3D2244072%20" cmp-ltrk="inline-link" cmp-ltrk-idx="18" mrfobservableid="e9a124b4-dabd-48f4-bc51-e0efe55037f3">Uefa.com</a>:</p><ul id="057acfb0-5ddd-4012-97e7-986b73ada4f5"><li>Champions League goals (group stage to final): Ronaldo 140 (21 for Man Utd; 105 for Real Madrid; 14 for Juventus); Messi 129 (120 for Barcelona; 9 for PSG)</li><li>Total Uefa competition goals (Champions League and Europa League): Ronaldo 144; Messi 132</li><li>Champions League hat-tricks: Ronaldo 8; Messi 8</li><li>All-time Champions League group stage goals: Ronaldo 73; Messi 80</li><li>Did you know? Ronaldo is the only player to score in three Uefa Champions League finals, and the first to score in 11 successive Champions League matches</li></ul><p id="04b6461a-26ff-4f09-9a83-333343480703"><strong>Champions League head-to-head</strong></p><ul id="a7379dfe-bb6d-4beb-85a7-7272173cd3d8"><li>Ronaldo Champions League stats: 140 goals, 40 assists, 183 appearances</li><li>Messi Champions League stats: 129 goals, 38 assists, 169 appearances</li><li>Ronaldo Champions League winnersâ€™ medals â€“ 5: 2007-08 (with Man Utd); 2013-14, 2015-16, 2016-17, 2017-18 (with Real Madrid)</li><li>Messi Champions League winnersâ€™ medals â€“ 4: 2005-06, 2008-09, 2010-11, 2014-15 (all with Barcelona)</li><li>Career hat-tricks in the Champions League: 8 each</li></ul><a id="elk-their-last-ever-meeting" class="paywall" aria-hidden="true" data-url="" href="" target="_blank" referrerpolicy="no-referrer-when-downgrade" data-hl-processed="none" data-hawk-tracked="hawklinks"></a><h2 class="article-body__section" id="section-their-last-ever-meeting"><span>Their last ever meeting?</span></h2><figure class="van-image-figure " data-bordeaux-image-check="" id="6c6bf40f-48db-47cb-ba54-bb5e5acf39c9"><div class="image-full-width-wrapper"><div class="image-widthsetter"><p class="vanilla-image-block" style="padding-top:56.25%;"> <picture data-new-v2-image="true">
<source type="image/webp" srcset="https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/FVft6wesA6ALqspw2tF9TK.jpg.webp 1920w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/FVft6wesA6ALqspw2tF9TK.jpg.webp 1600w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/FVft6wesA6ALqspw2tF9TK.jpg.webp 1280w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/FVft6wesA6ALqspw2tF9TK.jpg.webp 1024w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/FVft6wesA6ALqspw2tF9TK.jpg.webp 768w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/FVft6wesA6ALqspw2tF9TK.jpg.webp 415w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/FVft6wesA6ALqspw2tF9TK.jpg.webp 360w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/FVft6wesA6ALqspw2tF9TK.jpg.webp 320w" sizes="(min-width: 710px) 670px, calc(100vw - 30px)">
<img src="https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/FVft6wesA6ALqspw2tF9TK.jpg" alt="Cristiano Ronaldo battles with Lionel Messi in the Riyadh friendly match" srcset="https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/FVft6wesA6ALqspw2tF9TK.jpg 1920w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/FVft6wesA6ALqspw2tF9TK.jpg 1600w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/FVft6wesA6ALqspw2tF9TK.jpg 1280w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/FVft6wesA6ALqspw2tF9TK.jpg 1024w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/FVft6wesA6ALqspw2tF9TK.jpg 768w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/FVft6wesA6ALqspw2tF9TK.jpg 415w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/FVft6wesA6ALqspw2tF9TK.jpg 360w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/FVft6wesA6ALqspw2tF9TK.jpg 320w" sizes="(min-width: 710px) 670px, calc(100vw - 30px)" loading="lazy" data-new-v2-image="true" data-original-mos="https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/FVft6wesA6ALqspw2tF9TK.jpg" data-pin-media="https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/FVft6wesA6ALqspw2tF9TK.jpg">
</picture></p></div></div><figcaption class=""><div class="caption-text"><p>Cristiano Ronaldo battles with Lionel Messi in the Riyadh friendly match</p></div></figcaption><div class="credit">(Image credit: Aurelien Meunier/PSG/Getty Images)</div></figure><p id="b1635d54-27af-4a99-9654-bc989db1f5f2">Cristiano Ronaldo and Lionel Messi have possibly shared a football pitch for the final time in their glittering careers. In an exhibition game between a Riyadh All-Star XI and Paris Saint-Germain on 19 January 2023, Ronaldo scored twice in his first match in Saudi Arabia, while Messi scored once for PSG, who won the contest 5-4.</p><p>It was a â€œthrillingâ€ match in the Saudi capital city as the â€œtwo GOATs faced offâ€, said Shamoon Hafez on <a data-analytics-id="inline-link" href="https://www.bbc.co.uk/sport/football/64337699%20" target="_blank" data-url="https://www.bbc.co.uk/sport/football/64337699%20" referrerpolicy="no-referrer-when-downgrade" data-hl-processed="none" data-mrf-recirculation="inline-link" data-hawk-tracked="hawklinks" data-mrf-link="https://www.bbc.co.uk/sport/football/64337699%20" cmp-ltrk="inline-link" cmp-ltrk-idx="19" mrfobservableid="b1870773-74c6-400e-a34f-608ad68ff2ef">BBC Sport</a>. And it was â€œfittingâ€ that Ronaldoâ€™s first game in the Gulf was against his â€œold foeâ€ Messi, who lifted the World Cup in neighbouring Qatar just a month before.</p><p>The star duo have â€œcontestedâ€ El Clasico, â€œfought it outâ€ in the Champions League, â€œsquared offâ€ in the colours of their country, and â€œtogether they have reached such magnificent heightsâ€, said Riath Al-Samarrai in the <a data-analytics-id="inline-link" href="https://www.dailymail.co.uk/sport/football/article-11655341/Ronaldo-vs-Messi-sad-great-rivalry-ends-Saudi-Arabia.html%20" target="_blank" data-url="https://www.dailymail.co.uk/sport/football/article-11655341/Ronaldo-vs-Messi-sad-great-rivalry-ends-Saudi-Arabia.html%20" referrerpolicy="no-referrer-when-downgrade" data-hl-processed="none" data-mrf-recirculation="inline-link" data-hawk-tracked="hawklinks" data-mrf-link="https://www.dailymail.co.uk/sport/football/article-11655341/Ronaldo-vs-Messi-sad-great-rivalry-ends-Saudi-Arabia.html%20" cmp-ltrk="inline-link" cmp-ltrk-idx="20" mrfobservableid="40e01a39-c8b4-4ff2-af35-1ef5c4aabb13">Daily Mail</a>. Messiâ€™s â€œstill on top of the worldâ€ and Ronaldo â€œhas got his paydayâ€, but against â€œa backdrop of Saudi sportswashingâ€, the end of this â€œonce-great rivalryâ€ is certainly â€œtinged with sadnessâ€.</p><a id="elk-what-people-say-about-messi" class="paywall" aria-hidden="true" data-url="" href="" target="_blank" referrerpolicy="no-referrer-when-downgrade" data-hl-processed="none" data-hawk-tracked="hawklinks"></a><h2 class="article-body__section" id="section-what-people-say-about-messi"><span>What people say about Messi </span></h2><figure class="van-image-figure " data-bordeaux-image-check="" id="986ae1d2-5377-4d32-9e80-29de0a832c45"><div class="image-full-width-wrapper"><div class="image-widthsetter"><p class="vanilla-image-block" style="padding-top:56.25%;"> <picture data-new-v2-image="true">
<source type="image/webp" srcset="https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/5xqVah5jSfqhjNd6LSCJ7V.jpg.webp 1920w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/5xqVah5jSfqhjNd6LSCJ7V.jpg.webp 1600w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/5xqVah5jSfqhjNd6LSCJ7V.jpg.webp 1280w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/5xqVah5jSfqhjNd6LSCJ7V.jpg.webp 1024w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/5xqVah5jSfqhjNd6LSCJ7V.jpg.webp 768w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/5xqVah5jSfqhjNd6LSCJ7V.jpg.webp 415w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/5xqVah5jSfqhjNd6LSCJ7V.jpg.webp 360w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/5xqVah5jSfqhjNd6LSCJ7V.jpg.webp 320w" sizes="(min-width: 710px) 670px, calc(100vw - 30px)">
<img src="https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/5xqVah5jSfqhjNd6LSCJ7V.jpg" alt="Argentina captain Lionel Messi at the World Cup in Qatar" srcset="https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/5xqVah5jSfqhjNd6LSCJ7V.jpg 1920w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/5xqVah5jSfqhjNd6LSCJ7V.jpg 1600w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/5xqVah5jSfqhjNd6LSCJ7V.jpg 1280w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/5xqVah5jSfqhjNd6LSCJ7V.jpg 1024w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/5xqVah5jSfqhjNd6LSCJ7V.jpg 768w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/5xqVah5jSfqhjNd6LSCJ7V.jpg 415w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/5xqVah5jSfqhjNd6LSCJ7V.jpg 360w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/5xqVah5jSfqhjNd6LSCJ7V.jpg 320w" sizes="(min-width: 710px) 670px, calc(100vw - 30px)" loading="lazy" data-new-v2-image="true" data-original-mos="https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/5xqVah5jSfqhjNd6LSCJ7V.jpg" data-pin-media="https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/5xqVah5jSfqhjNd6LSCJ7V.jpg">
</picture></p></div></div><figcaption class=""><div class="caption-text"><p>Argentina captain Lionel Messi at the World Cup in Qatar</p></div></figcaption><div class="credit">(Image credit: Anthony Bibard/FEP/Icon Sport/Getty Images)</div></figure><p id="c3c23d5c-1e6c-4b5a-9aaf-4a6dc02ee373"><strong>Cristiano Ronaldo: </strong>â€œI really admire the career he has had so far, and, for his part, he has already said that he had trouble when I left the Spanish league because it is a rivalry that he appreciates. It is a good rivalry that exists in football, but this is no exception. Michael Jordan had rivals in basketball, Ayrton Senna and Alain Prost were great rivals in Formula One, the only common point between all the big rivalries in the sport is that they are healthy.â€</p><p id="a7c1115c-280a-4c92-b0fa-c685d67d60a8"><strong>Gigi Buffon:</strong> â€œWhen I met Messi I reached out and touched him. I needed to make sure he was human like the rest of us.â€</p><p id="65e50ec2-035d-40f7-83e5-4578d73f07dd"><strong>Ronaldinho:</strong> â€œWhen I look back on my career, the most enjoyable thing was seeing the early years of Leo Messi. When he retires, football â€“ not just Barcelona â€“ should retire the No.10 shirt.â€</p><p id="ceb5f772-e0a2-44fe-b8f1-0af6833e75e6"><strong>Pep Guardiola:</strong> â€œHe is the best player I have ever seen. The best thing about him is not what he does but how simple he makes everything look.He is not just the best player because he can dribble past three or four players, it is because he does it better than anyone in the world.â€</p><p id="99f5f7bb-bfa8-44d6-aa32-378a7b3c535a"><strong>Neymar:</strong> â€œI played with Messi, who is, for me, one of the greatest footballers of all time, and he is my idol in football.â€</p><p id="b2d1633d-6c7f-48d2-8bd0-50002a1cad6f"><strong>Diego Maradona:</strong> â€œI have seen the player who will inherit my place in Argentine football and his name is Messi. Messi is a genius.â€</p><p id="0985e875-af3b-47ac-b03b-04f7d6d8b90c"><strong>David Beckham:</strong> â€œHe [Messi] is alone in his class as a player, it is impossible that there is another like him. He, like Cristiano Ronaldo, who is not at his level, are both above the rest.â€</p><a id="elk-what-people-say-about-ronaldo" class="paywall" aria-hidden="true" data-url="" href="" target="_blank" referrerpolicy="no-referrer-when-downgrade" data-hl-processed="none" data-hawk-tracked="hawklinks"></a><h2 class="article-body__section" id="section-what-people-say-about-ronaldo"><span>What people say about Ronaldo </span></h2><figure class="van-image-figure " data-bordeaux-image-check="" id="c1b4f4fc-6cce-49db-944b-7467e9e7b21f"><div class="image-full-width-wrapper"><div class="image-widthsetter"><p class="vanilla-image-block" style="padding-top:56.25%;"> <picture data-new-v2-image="true">
<source type="image/webp" srcset="https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/GXm4HGMVZgBKmRJKvDgheD.jpg.webp 1920w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/GXm4HGMVZgBKmRJKvDgheD.jpg.webp 1600w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/GXm4HGMVZgBKmRJKvDgheD.jpg.webp 1280w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/GXm4HGMVZgBKmRJKvDgheD.jpg.webp 1024w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/GXm4HGMVZgBKmRJKvDgheD.jpg.webp 768w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/GXm4HGMVZgBKmRJKvDgheD.jpg.webp 415w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/GXm4HGMVZgBKmRJKvDgheD.jpg.webp 360w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/GXm4HGMVZgBKmRJKvDgheD.jpg.webp 320w" sizes="(min-width: 710px) 670px, calc(100vw - 30px)">
<img src="https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/GXm4HGMVZgBKmRJKvDgheD.jpg" alt="Cristiano Ronaldo was captain as Portugal won Euro 2016" srcset="https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/GXm4HGMVZgBKmRJKvDgheD.jpg 1920w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/GXm4HGMVZgBKmRJKvDgheD.jpg 1600w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/GXm4HGMVZgBKmRJKvDgheD.jpg 1280w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/GXm4HGMVZgBKmRJKvDgheD.jpg 1024w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/GXm4HGMVZgBKmRJKvDgheD.jpg 768w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/GXm4HGMVZgBKmRJKvDgheD.jpg 415w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/GXm4HGMVZgBKmRJKvDgheD.jpg 360w, https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/GXm4HGMVZgBKmRJKvDgheD.jpg 320w" sizes="(min-width: 710px) 670px, calc(100vw - 30px)" loading="lazy" data-new-v2-image="true" data-original-mos="https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/GXm4HGMVZgBKmRJKvDgheD.jpg" data-pin-media="https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/GXm4HGMVZgBKmRJKvDgheD.jpg">
</picture></p></div></div><figcaption class=""><div class="caption-text"><p>Cristiano Ronaldo was captain as Portugal won Euro 2016</p></div></figcaption><div class="credit">(Image credit: Getty Images)</div></figure><p id="6def22bd-b92b-47c7-996f-93762637f2b8"><strong>Lionel Messi:</strong> â€œ(Ronaldo) is always there scoring goals in all the games and taking part in his club and national side. He has been doing that for many years and whether he is at his peak or a bit below it makes no difference.â€</p><p id="c57c80ce-9e75-4d80-825f-43acc0455151"><strong>Brazil legend Pele, after Ronaldo reached 770 official goals:</strong> â€œLife is a solo flight. Each makes his own journey. And what a beautiful journey you are having. I admire you a lot, I love watching you play and this is no secret to anyone. Congratulations on breaking my record of goals in official matches. My only regret is not being able to give you a hug today.â€</p><p id="e1f8fcd1-df61-482d-a5b9-7e06354c7251"><strong>George Best:</strong> â€œThere have been a few players described as the new George Best over the years, but this is the first time itâ€™s been a compliment to me.â€</p><p id="dc7cb2c9-830e-4b70-ab5b-de7b31a65722"><strong>Zinedine Zidane:</strong> â€œWhen you play with Ronaldo on your team, you are already 1-0 up.â€</p><p id="589af4d4-ee58-49e8-b0bd-e86eee559353"><strong>Gerard Pique:</strong> â€œThe best player I have ever played against has to be Ronaldo. You cannot afford to take your eyes off him.â€</p><p id="aa683ef6-d861-4f1d-8dc6-59a218e21d6c"><strong>Paolo Di Canio:</strong> â€œMessi left the pitch scratching his head, he has no emotions. I prefer Cristiano Ronaldo. â€˜Do you want me to sit on the bench against Man City?â€™ I go back to Portugal, then I return and score a hat-trick. I prefer the human who has a soul to the alien without emotions.â€</p>

<div id="slice-container-authorBio-irF7LLiQTfeumHsnpaFxoB" class="slice-container slice-author-bio authorBio-irF7LLiQTfeumHsnpaFxoB slice-container-authorBio"><div class="author author__default-layout author--separator"><div class="author__header"><div class="author__heading"><div class="author__name"><a href="https://theweek.com/author/mike-starling" target="_self" class="link author__name_link" data-before-rewrite-localise="https://theweek.com/author/mike-starling">Mike Starling, The Week UK</a></div><div class="author__social"><nav class="button-social-group author__social-buttons" aria-labelledby="button-social-group- author__social-buttons"><div id="button-social-group- author__social-buttons" style="display:none">Social Links Navigation</div><a class="button-social   " href="mailto:theweekonlineeditorsuk@futurenet.com" target="_self" aria-label="EMAIL"><span class="button-social__icon button-social__icon-email"><svg class="icon-email" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 1000 1000"><path d="M958 185L540 524a67 67 0 0 1-81 0L40 185c-14-12-40-2-40 19v592a52 52 0 0 0 52 52h896a52 52 0 0 0 52-52V204c0-23-25-33-42-19zm-852 0l354 286a68 68 0 0 0 81 0l353-286c23-18 18-33-11-33H118c-29 0-34 15-12 33z"></path></svg></span></a></nav></div></div></div><div class="author__biography"><p>Mike Starling is the former digital features editor at The Week. He started his career in 2001 in Gloucestershire as a sports reporter and sub-editor and has held various roles as a writer and editor at news, travel and B2B publications. He has spoken at a number of sports business conferences and also worked as a consultant creating sports travel content for tourism boards. International experience includes spells living and working in Dubai, UAE; Brisbane, Australia; and Beirut, Lebanon.&nbsp;</p></div></div></div>
</section>
